page.title: 12FARMING - SHEEP
page.content: {SHEEP FLEECES}are sold to {THE WOOL {MARKETING BOARD.}Best quality Masham fleeces fetch Â£1.25 per kg. Best Suffolk Â£1.11 kg and poor quality fleeces Â£0.86 kg. Some lambs are kept for breeding others are sent at 7 months for meat. {SHEEP DOG HANDLING} JAMES GILL, aged 16 years, son ofDavid Gill is one of the countries leading youngsters at Sheep Dog Trials. He has represented England at International level and was given 2nd place in{ {THE LAND ROVER LTD. YOUNG HANDLERS {AWARD,1984} competition. {FARM YEAR {AUTUMN}- Ewes mated with rams. Dipped for sheep scab. Dosed for parasites. {WINTER}- fed hay & roots & proteins. {SPRING}- Lambing, tails docked,dosed. {SUMMER}- Shearing June/July.Dipped for fly maggots. Remove lambs from ewes.
